RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_DBA_TABLES_CHECK_W_STATS *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_dba_tables_check_w_stats LINE-SIZE 256.
TABLES: tadir, tdevc. TYPE-POOLS: abap, icon.
SELECT-OPTIONS: s_srcs FOR tadir-srcsystem DEFAULT sy-sysid, s_soft FOR tdevc-dlvunit, * s_type FOR tadir-object, s_name FOR tadir-obj_name, s_pack FOR tadir-devclass. PARAMETERS: p_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_author FOR tadir-author DEFAULT sy-uname.
PARAMETERS: p_size TYPE ygpl_dba_table_size.
DATA o_obj_size TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_object_size.
INITIALIZATION. PERFORM set_default_object_size IN PROGRAM ygpl_dba_cockpit CHANGING p_size o_obj_size.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA o_list TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_table_list. DATA o_check TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_check_table.
PERFORM create_list IN PROGRAM ygpl_dba_cockpit USING s_srcs[] s_soft[] s_name[] s_pack[] s_author[] p_ext p_size CHANGING o_list.
o_check = ygpl_dba_factories=>create_check_table_using_stats( ). o_check->set_list( o_list ). o_check->do_check( ).
PERFORM display_result IN PROGRAM ygpl_tables_check USING o_check.
END-OF-SELECTION.

ITEM.LONG_TXT: U1&PURPOSE& ASCheck the selected tables. This action is the same as the "check button" on table display in transaction SE11. ASOnly messages like "Index &-& completely contains the fields of index &" are returned. ASBefore comparing indexes, index's fields that only have one possible value are removed from index definition before calling check function. Indexes that do not have common fields list might be reported as because field that make the difference is useless because has only one distinct value. U1&INTEGRATION& ASDo not make any action on table or index. U1&PREREQUISITES& ASThis analyze must be done ONLY in productive SAP system. ASThis analyze must be compared with the standard table check in SE11. Only "new indexes" that are not listed in SE11 should be investigated. U1&FEATURES& AS U2&SELECTION& AS U2&STANDARD_VARIANTS& AS U2&OUTPUT& AS U1&ACTIVITIES& ASYou should adapt or delete the index (the one that completely contains the fields of an other index). B1If this index is a SAP one, please considerer deleting this index because useless in your system. B1If this index is a customer one, please fix this issue by removing the index or adapting it. U1&EXAMPLE& AS

ITEM.ENTRY: Control Table Indexes using Indexes Statistics V0.0
